Key Match Events: Devin Carter led his own 8-2 run against the Celtics, bombing two rainbow threes and a layup
The Kings never surrendered that lead, the Celtics never got closer than 5
Domantas Sabonis finished with 23 points and 28 rebounds
Post-Match Reflections: The Kings have now won 6 straight games and are back to.500 for the season
The win brings the Kings up the standings to the 9th seed, and the Kings are 3.5 games back from the 4th seed
Miscellaneous Highlights: Up Next: The Kings have an early game against the Chicago Bulls on Sunday, tipping off at 12:30 PM PT
Others: DeMar DeRozan and Malik Monk both struggled with their shooting, but both players shot through their slumps, while also sharing the ball
